name: Turkey Breast Club
description: Boar's Head roasted turkey breast, Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato, crispy bacon and mayo on Tuscan bread.

name: Caprese Wrap
description: Fresh mozzarella sliced tomatoes roasted peppers seasoning and olive oil.

name: Bologna and Cheese Wrap
description: Bologna and cheese in a tortilla wrap.

name: Classic Italian Sub
description: Genoa salami, pepperoni, ham, provolone cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, Italian dressing on a sub roll.

name: Greek Salad
description: Fresh mixed greens, feta cheese, Kalamata olives, cucumber, tomato, red onion, Greek dressing.

name: Pastrami Reuben
description: Thinly sliced pastrami, Swiss cheese, sauerkraut, Thousand Island dressing on rye bread.

name: Mediterranean Wrap
description: Grilled chicken, roasted red peppers, feta cheese, lettuce, cucumber, tzatziki sauce wrapped in a tortilla.

name: Vegetarian Panini
description: Grilled eggplant, zucchini, roasted red peppers, spinach, on ciabatta bread.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Grilled chicken, BBQ sauce, red onions, cilantro, mozzarella cheese on a thin crust.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing.
